content: > click here to view and download the free pattern from my blog 1 this set is the perfect gift to knit for anyone whether it s for your female co-worker or your grandfather even picky people will love these it s oh-so-cozy and warm it s unisex and it s just perfect anyone would love to receive this to keep them warm in cold weather use 100% alpaca wool for the coziest feel _______________________________ **pattern overview** this scarf and hat are knit in garter stitch with slipped stitches the hat is worked crown to brim and the scarf lengthwise the pattern shows the same on both right side and wrong side of garments the yarn used in this pattern claimed to be dk but a sport weight or even fingering weight could work just as well ____________________________________ **sizing** scarf size about 8 in / 19 8 cm in width and 5 5 ft / 1 6 m in adjustable length hat sizes 18 21 24 in / 45 7 53 61 cm - choose a size with 1 to 2 in / 2 5 to 5 cm negative ease **yarn and gauge** 2 5 mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge 24 sts and 36 row in 4 in / 10 cm square uses 100% alpaca wool dk **notions** tapestry needle stitch markers one removable **techniques** ez sewn bind off german twisted cast on magic loop cast on __________________________________________________ my patterns have been tech edited and tested my patterns are for advanced beginners and up you should have a basic understanding of increases decreases and other basic stitches and techniques such as grafting and casting on tutorial links will be provided to certain techniques 1 https //www frasierknits net/post/the-gifting-scarf-and-hat-free-knitting-pattern
